name: Escape From Hell (Ashleigh0401)
description:
Escape From Hell

You must make your way through the circles of Hell to reach the innermost circle. You need to retrieve those wrongfully perceived as betrayers before they're trapped there forever. You must reach the inner circle and retrieve the innocent. 

Make your way through the levels defeating various enemies and collecting a variety of pick ups which will help you progress. 

Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to shoot.
